# attributes

**Instance Property**

An array containing the attribute keys for the metadata item’s values.

## Declaration

```swift
var attributes: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains an array of attribute keys, representing the values available from this metadata item. For a list of possible keys, see `Attribute Keys`.

## Getting Item Attributes

- **value(forAttribute:)**: Returns the receiver’s metadata attribute name specified by a given key.
- **values(forAttributes:)**: Returns a dictionary containing the key-value pairs for the attribute names specified by a given array of keys.

items.description: Returns the receiver’s metadata attribute name specified by a given key.
items.name: value(forAttribute:)

items.description: Returns a dictionary containing the key-value pairs for the attribute names specified by a given array of keys.
